channel.title: polybar on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe
channel.description: Recent content in polybar on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe

item.title: pbmail
item.description: pbmail - Outputs unread mail count SYNOPSIS pbmail [-v|-h] DESCRIPTION pbmail is meant to be used with polybar to display unread mail count. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit.

item.title: pbmedia
item.description: pbmedia - Displays the filename of the currently active media file. SYNOPSIS pbmedia [-v|-h] DESCRIPTION pbmedia Prints the filename of the currently playing media file in mpd or mpv. And applies some string and color formatting depending on the state and path of the file. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. DEPENDENCIES i3viswiz i3get mpd mpc mpv

item.title: pbtitle
item.description: pbtitle - Short description SYNOPSIS pbtitle [-v|-h] EVENT DESCRIPTION pbtitle is intended to be used as output in a statusbar. Different output is displayed depending on the EVENT. EVENT OUTPUT advanced Class and instance of active window normal Title of active window color 16 colors defined in .xresources focus – title – When rightc licked objects will be put into the ClipBoard

item.title: pbweather
item.description: pbweather - Prints weather information SYNOPSIS pbweather [-v|-h] OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit.

item.title: pbws
item.description: pbws - Minimal workspace indication SYNOPSIS pbws [-v|-h] DESCRIPTION pbws outputs a symbol representing the current worskpace and the total number of workspaces. Inteded to be used with polybar. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. ENVIRONMENT PBWS_SYMBOL_WORKSPACE_NUMBER This symbol will be used to indicate the current workspace, if empty the workspace number will be used. DEPENDENCIES polybar
